mapper.insert: insert into pete_entrust (pete_id, pete_board_num, pete_subject, pete_content, pete_house_photo, pete_location, pete_space, pete_animals_kind, pete_walk, pete_family, pete_house_original, pete_pass, pete_time_in,pete_time_out,pete_time_out2,pete_time_in2) values (#{pete_id},pete_num_seq.nextval,#{pete_subject},#{pete_content},#{pete_house_photo}, #{pete_location}, #{pete_space}, #{pete_animals_kind}, #{pete_walk}, #{pete_family}, #{pete_house_original}, #{pete_pass}, #{pete_time_in}, #{pete_time_out}, #{pete_time_out2}, #{pete_time_in2})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, pete_id, pete_board_num, pete_subject, pete_content, pete_house_photo, pete_location,pete_space,pete_animals_kind, pete_walk,pete_family,pete_house_original, pete_pass, pete_time_in,pete_time_out,pete_time_out2,pete_time_in2 from (select * from pete_entrust order by pete_board_num desc )) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * #{limit} + 1 ) and rnum <= (#{page} * #{limit})
mapper.update: update pete_entrust set pete_subject = #{pete_subject}, pete_content = #{pete_content}, pete_location = #{pete_location}, pete_space = #{pete_space}, pete_animals_kind = #{pete_animals_kind}, pete_walk = #{pete_walk}, pete_family = #{pete_family}, pete_house_photo = #{pete_house_photo}, pete_house_original = #{pete_house_original}, pete_time_in = #{pete_time_in}, pete_time_out = #{pete_time_out}, pete_time_out2 = #{pete_time_out2}, pete_time_in2 = #{pete_time_in2} where pete_board_num = #{pete_board_num}
mapper.insert: insert into pete_reservation (pete_id, join_id, pete_kind, pete_board_num, pete_kind_many, pete_date, pete_price, pete_date2) values (#{pete_id}, #{join_id}, #{pete_kind}, #{pete_board_num}, #{pete_kind_many}, #{pete_date}, #{pete_price}, #{pete_date2})

insert into pet_epilogue (pet_id, pet_info, pet_feces, pet_vaccin, pet_friendly, pet_disease, pet_bark) values (#{pet_id}, #{pet_info}, #{pet_feces}, #{pet_vaccin}, #{pet_friendly}, #{pet_disease}, #{pet_bark})

insert into pete_epil (pete_epil_id, join_epil_id, pete_epil_subject, pete_epil_content, pete_epil_star) values (#{pete_epil_id}, #{join_epil_id}, #{pete_epil_subject}, #{pete_epil_content}, #{pete_epil_star})
mapper.select: select count(*) from pete_reservation where join_id = #{join_id}
